description: The TEWKEN token captures the network value of the Tewkenaire Network and allows everyone in the TRON community to participate passively. TEWKEN is scarce, it has progressive mining difficulty and limited max supply of 100 million.
utility: The TEWKEN token captures the network value of the Tewkenaire Network and allows everyone in the TRON community to participate passively. TEWKEN is scarce, it has progressive mining difficulty and limited max supply of 100 million.
top_6_features: Consensus via Delegate Proof of Stake (Fast Paxos)
Decentralized voting system for issuance of tokens
Can be staked to earn staking rewards
